channel.title: Once Upon A Time
channel.description: Behind the technicolor confections of Disney’s most beloved films, there are age-old tales of friendship, adventure, heroism — and treachery. In this special collection of Parcast episodes, celebrate the timeless (and twisted) stories that first inspired the animated hits, and trace the legacy of the original Imagineer, Walt Disney himself. Once Upon A Time is a Spotify Original from Parcast.

item.title: The Twelve Huntsmen, Part 2
item.description: Our spurned princess's quest for vengeance turns into a deadlier hunt than she ever imagined. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Twelve Huntsmen, Part 1
item.description: In this classic Brothers Grimm tale, a jilted princess is determined to get revenge against her former lover… by any means necessary. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Rumpelstiltskin
item.description: When a young woman is told to do the impossible and spin straw into gold, she makes a dangerous deal with an imp who can help her. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Beauty and the Beast, Part 2
item.description: Trapped within the Beast’s castle, Beauty grows anxious over her imminent death. In her dreams, she meets with a prince, who happens to be a fellow prisoner of the Beast. She becomes determined to save this man... before her time runs out. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Beauty and the Beast, Part 1
item.description: A merchant who’s lost everything picks a lovely rose… and finds himself bargaining with a beast for his life. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Princess and the Pea
item.description: Having a list of preferred qualities in a partner is a classic dating trope. But if Prince Erik wants to find a wife, he’ll have to abide by someone else’s list – his mother’s. And her list comes with a catch. If a princess doesn’t measure up… she gets killed. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Snow White & Rose Red
item.description: Today’s story follows a young Snow White and her sister as their mother forces them to spend time together. As they go about their chores, their encounters with an ungrateful dwarf lead them to form a bond capable of surviving any ordeal. Of course no Brother's Grimm tale would be complete without at least one character meeting a grisly end... Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Little Red Riding Hood
item.description: The modern retelling of this classic tale is well-known, but the French, Thai, and Norwegian versions vary significantly. Yet one thing remains constant: sweet, innocent grandma is not making it out alive. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Peter Pan, Part 3
item.description: Hurt and unable to fly, it seems Peter Pan is out of luck. Will anyone be there to come to his aid when he needs it the most? Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Peter Pan, Part 2
item.description: A jealous Tinkerbell attempts to murder Wendy, and Peter Pan shows his dark side. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Peter Pan, Part 1
item.description: In this version, a young Peter flies to an island and introduces himself as Peter the Bird. But hard lessons are waiting for him in the wings. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Mulan
item.description: A devoted daughter risks her life to become a warrior, and returns from war a hero. But this older version of the story features death, betrayal, and a tragic ending. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Rapunzel
item.description: In this early version of the Rapunzel fairy tale, a mother’s warning is pitted against the charms of a prince. Enjoy this episode from Tales, a Spotify Original from Parcast!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Snow Queen
item.description: The inspiration behind Disney’s “Frozen” comes from a Hans Christian Anderson tale about a powerful enchantress. Her icy chill reaches into the heart of a young boy, whose only hope of redemption lies with his best friend Gerta.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Abandoned Disney Parks
item.description: Most Disney attractions are full of wonder and delight… But what happens when they’re overgrown and derelict? And maybe more importantly… why would they ever become that way? Loey Lane and Snitchery dissect the haunting histories of two abandoned Disney theme parks, and find out why they’re decidedly *not* the happiest places on Earth. From Internet Urban Legends, a Spotify Original from Parcast.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Hercules
item.description: For their next hit, Disney reached back further than ever before — to Greek mythology. Hercules is a story of godly proportions, with immense tragedy prefacing an epic redemption. From infancy, the demigod is locked in a war with the vengeful goddess Hera, who tears his life apart to satisfy her wrath. The path Hercules takes after makes him one of Greece’s greatest heroes.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Aladdin
item.description: Today’s tale traveled from a Syrian storyteller to a French translator in the 18th century. From there, it was included in the legendary folktale collection: One Thousand and One Nights. It’s the story of a lazy boy whose life is changed when he discovers a magical lamp…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Little Mermaid
item.description: From beloved author Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid is a daring tale of a spunky mermaid who dreams of life on land. So far, so Disney. But this original version has a grim overcast, and a heartrending finale.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Sleeping Beauty
item.description: It’s one of the world’s most recognizable stories — a cursed princess is saved by true love’s kiss. But in the original version of this tale, it’s anything but true love. And it’s a vengeful queen, not an evil fairy, who plots to destroy our princess.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Alice in Wonderland
item.description: Into the rabbit hole we go… Today we venture into Wonderland, and the story of a young girl who loses herself in a bewildering alternate reality that is brimming with fantasies and frustrations.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Cinderella
item.description: By 1948, the studio was in massive debt. They had one shot to make a comeback. The film that made it happen was, of course, Cinderella. A story that’s been told in different ways, in different cultures, for centuries.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Pinocchio
item.description: A popular Italian story about a mean-spirited puppet would give Disney its next hit — with some adjustments. Today, we tell the original tale in all its devilish glory. Becoming a good boy, let alone a real one, is going to take more than a wish upon a star…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Snow White
item.description: Disney’s first animated feature film was based on an iconic story of jealousy, vanity, and boundless cruelty — with a twist of vengeance to cap it all off. Today’s story entwines three original versions of Snow White, starting with her magical birth and ending with a scalding confrontation.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: ...There Was A Boy Named Walt
item.description: Despite all the magic he’d go on to create, Walt Disney’s early career wasn’t the smoothest carpet ride — so let’s start at the beginning, with a small-time artist doing everything he can to keep his dreams alive.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Introducing: Once Upon A Time
item.description: Pinocchio is a tragedy, Sleeping Beauty is a horror story, and the Little Mermaid turns to seafoam in the end. If you’ve ever wondered what first inspired Disney’s most beloved movies, dive into this special collection of Parcast episodes — where nine twisted tales underpin the iconic stories and characters we’ve all come to love.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
